name: Karting In Space
description:
Made for the Friday Night Game Jam #32 in 3h using the free Karting Microgame Template from the Unity Asset Store

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/karting-microgame-150956

and using Oscar Azcautli's Rings of Saturn.

Did you like it? :)

Regarding Colors - https://coolors.co/bcb6ff-e0ca3c-488b49-fd151b-2081c3
This is my set of colors I was allowed to use
